name: spells-timer
description: Time ennemies summoner spells with your voice.

scripts.build:app: browserify app/index.jsx -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react stage-0 ] ] --debug --sourceMapRelative -o www/index.js
scripts.build: npm run build:sass -s; npm run build:app -s
scripts.watch:app: watchify app/index.jsx -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react stage-0 ] ] --debug -o www/index.js
scripts.browser: npm run watch:sass -s & npm run watch:app -s & npm run watch:serve -s
scripts.simulator: npm run watch:sass -s & npm run watch:app -s & npm run watch:emulate -s
